title: For Sale: Low Grade Southern League T206 Miller
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: For Sale: Low Grade Southern League T206 Miller
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have a low-grade T206 Southern Leaguer for sale.

The card is Molly Miller, Dallas. The price is $28, which includes delivery, but not insurance. Add an extra $1.75 for insurance.

You can contact me at [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

Here are links to the scans of the front and back:

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-327b.jpg[/IMG] 

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-327rb.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks.

Cy
